skillTree.localised_description: The Queen in the Woods influences every acre of her realm, her lifeforce ever intertwined with the forest itself.
Wherever Ariel treads, trees and vegetation are compelled to spring forth to provide sustenance and haven for her kin.

effects.description:
Construction time: -20% for all buildings
	(local province)

Construction cost: -20% for all buildings
	(local province)

skillTree.localised_description: If the glades are to survive these dark times, the Queen needs champions willing and able to put other lands to the sword.
Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: By Isha’s otherworldly influence, the Winds blow fortuitously across lands where her children need it the most.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve change: +15% when increasing

skillTree.localised_description: Ariel is a conduit of deific power, capable of wielding spellcraft as if she herself were the Goddess of Nature.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -10% for all spells

skillTree.localised_description: The Mother’s demeanour is one of a wholesome Elven maiden, both of great beauty and bounteous lifeforce.
Ariel becomes ever more warlike as the decline of the natural world continues, thus perpetuating her dangerous, mothlike form.

effects.description: Enable contact effect: "Charmed" that lowers melee attack

skillTree.localised_description: Every twig, stick, branch and trunk of Athel Loren is infused with the awesome power of nature in its rawest form.

effects.description: Cooldown: -25% to "Dart of Doom" and "Acorns of the Oak of Ages"

unit_ability.onscreen_name: Acorns of the Oak of Ages

effects.description: Ability number of uses: +1 for "Dart of Doom" and "Acorns of the Oak of Ages"

unit_ability.onscreen_name: Acorns of the Oak of Ages

effects.description: Cooldown: -50% to "Dart of Doom" and "Acorns of the Oak of Ages"

skillTree.localised_description: "A robust and otherworldly vintage, with a distinctly spellbinding aftertaste."

effects.description: Ability number of uses: +1 for "Berry Wine"
Ability number of uses: +1 for "Berry Wine"

skillTree.localised_description: "All shall love me, and despair."
Ariel's handmaidens are imbued with the boundless energy of spring.

	(own armies in province)

	(Hero's army)

	(Hero's army)

Attribute: Perfect Vigour for Sisters of the Thorn units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The Queen of the Asrai rarely commands armies, but those she empowers to lead the Deepwood Host do so with illustrious authority.
Ariel's magics interweave with those of her sorcerous acolytes, infusing the air with a harmony of power.

effects.description:
Winds of Magic cost: -10% for all spells
	(Hero's army)

Cooldown: -25% for bound spells on Sisters of the Thorn units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Prickly gorse bursts from the ground around the caster's allies, protecting them from attack like a spiky, living shield.

skillTree.localised_description: This spell causes gnarled, fibrous hands to emerge from beneath the ground, dragging the foe to a claustrophobic, suffocating end.

Strong vs single and multiple units

skillTree.localised_description: A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

effects.description:
Winds of Magic power reserve: +1 per turn
	(all units in army)
Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +5

skillTree.localised_description: Even the simplest of spells can bring forth the full bloom of renewal, reinvigorating and healing the broken and bleeding.
The most powerful Spellsingers can convince the forest to change its shape.

effects.description:
Construction cost: -1% for all buildings
	(local region)

Construction cost: -3% for all buildings
	(local region)

Construction cost: -6% for all buildings
	(local region)

skillTree.localised_description: The Spellsingers are connected to an ancient intelligence, greater than any in the world.
Wards against mundane dangers. There are far worse things the Spellsingers must contend with.
Her presence empowers the forest, even in the midst of the most bitter winters.
To be able to see the future is to be able to change it.

effects.description:
Hero action success chance: +3%
	(own characters in province)

Hero action success chance: +6%
	(own characters in province)

Hero action success chance: +10%
	(own characters in province)

skillTree.localised_description: Should she be wounded, the power of the Mage Queen will protect her.
Thereafter, Isha has watched the mortal children keenly, ever alert to ways in which she might aid them.
Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 5% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 12% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 21% chance of wounding target

skillTree.localised_description: To sow discord and confuse the enemy, sending them down the wrong route or befuddling their senses.

effects.description: Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -3%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -8%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -15%

skillTree.localised_description: Those in the army can find succour or be replenished by the power of this champion.

effects.description: Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 3%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 6%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 9%

skillTree.localised_description: The locals take notice and will be inspired or frightened into action.

effects.description: Cleanse Corruption action: Corruption is reduced by an additional 1
Cleanse Corruption action: Corruption is reduced by an additional 2
Cleanse Corruption action: Corruption is reduced by an additional 3

skillTree.localised_description: The sight of this warrior, their stature, import or infamy, can have a calming effect.

effects.description: Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 1
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 2
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 3

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

attributes.description: Vanguard Deployment||This unit can deploy outside the deployment zone.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Once the foremost of the Elven magi who first settled Athel Loren’s glades, now an all-powerful Mage Queen of deep prophetic wisdom.
